Unique Culinary Keys Experience
Key Largo Restaurant & Bar
For Foodies, Pizza Lovers, Fine Wine & Craft Beer Drinkers
A local’s owned, Key Largo Restaurant and Bar known for bringing the first Neapolitan wood-burning cooking style and pizza to the Upper Keys, along with a fun culinary experience!
We are known for some seriously amazing pizza, having been voted
Best Pizza in the Upper Keys
3 years running 2022, 2023, 2024!
Our dough and sauce are made daily, with classic, quality, fresh toppings as well as some unique ones to choose from.
We are a “scratch” kitchen and make the meatballs, desserts, sauces, dressings as well as many other menu items in house.
Our menu is all about “cooked to order” straight-forward, good food from quality ingredients we have hand-selected.
We so appreciate you, are glad that you are here and the you “get” us !
It’s All About the Vibe & the Pie!
Wood-Fire Pizza and Sooo much more!!
When you step inside our restaurant, you’ll first notice our large Neapolitan wood-burning oven at the heart of the place. No gas, no electric assist (that means we start it old school.. wood & flame only) …. this oven is fueled with oak wood only at all times and we promise you’ll love the taste of your freshly made pizza and many more menu items because of it.
The vibe is dark, cool, sexy, the fire hot, the music loud.  It is what we have created, what we do and do not change it.  Just relax and enjoy.
Favorite Pizzas… or Build Your Own
The Neapolitan Pizza oven’s average temperature is about 900 degrees, we do a 12″ pie cut into 6 slices and is meant to be “well done” with lots of char and leopard spots.   We have a variety of favorite pizzas to order—or you can create your own! Choose from any of our fresh ingredients. Enjoy our homemade dough, or our gluten-free cauliflower crust.  And yes, we have options for vegans like our vegan “mozzarella” cheese.
House Eats Menu
Pizza Menu
A Handful of Specialty & Artisan Options
What Started Us is Still Here
We were the first  place in Key Largo to offer amazing cheese boards and imported meats as we have since 2016 when we first opened as Cork & Curds.
Imported Meats, cheeses, almonds, fig spread, crackers, truffle oil and honey are few fan favorites that appear on our charcuterie & cheeseboards.
You Can Take Us Home
Find a bottle of wine you love? Take one home. We have the convenience factor of a wine & beer retail license and offer a discount on all products that you purchase to take out.
We are also happy to pre-order things buy the case for an even larger discount.  Just ask.
It’s all About
Really Good Ingredients
For every plate and every drink, nothing compares to the punch of flavor that fresh ingredients offer.  Imported and Domestic Artisan stuff has been “our thing” since 2016.  We were THE first to bring Italian, French, Spanish, Dutch and many more imported cheeses and meats to Key Largo and continue to do so.
We love our Florida Keys and although seafood is not what we concentrate on, we do serve some pretty killer oysters and seafood as featured specials to please every palate.
Please email us for any large format platters, pizza orders or takeout options for any and all occasions.
We source locally as often as possible, too.

We have a great, small space and because of that, we are first come, first serve and currently do not accept reservations.
We understand that parking is a bit of a challenge in our area.  We encourage any overflow vehicles to drive barely one block north to the “old” tennis courts at the Key Largo Inn.  There is plenty of off street parking and it’s a quick walk along the sidewalk back to C&C.
We also ask that if you do find a spot in our lot or on East Drive that you respect on coming traffic and the Fire Dept across the road and not block East Dr. by having any part of your vehicle in the traffic lane.
This is for everyone’s safety!!
We do offer a full restaurant "buy out" of C&C for private events or extra large parties and have a small event space for rent that can accommodate up to 30 guests.
Feel free to email us with your interest.
The Perfect Option for Your Special Private Event. Please contact us via email if interested
Catering & Private Events
If you are looking to host a special event at our Key Largo restaurant and bar and have a large group, a full restaurant ” buy out’ is always an option.  We are very small and larger parties are not always easy to accommodate.  If you have interest in buying us out for a private event, please email us woodfiredovenkeylargo@gmail.com to begin the conversation.
Please email woodfireovenkeylargo@gmail.com with plenty of notice to discuss details.
We currently do not offer “traditional” catering for off-property events as we do not have the equipment necessary to prepare or keep food warm at venues.
Our kitchen and staff are small so at this time, we choose to be a restaurant first but can offer menu items in a family-style format for pick up.
We Can Help
Customize Your Event
With a flexible menu and plenty of notice, the possibilities are really only limited by imagination. So email us to discuss customizable options for your event.
Our Key Largo restaurant and bar is small and intimate, and is the perfect spot for events of any kind.
In other words… we’ve here for it, whatever you need.
